meanings.definition: mythical female figures who choose those who may die in battle and those who may live
meanings.sent1: In the story, the valkyrs decided the fate of the warriors.
meanings.sent2: The valkyrs were believed to guide fallen soldiers to the afterlife.
meanings.sent3: The valkyrs must have a tough job, picking who wins and who loses.
meanings.sent4: The valkyrs' presence on the battlefield was like a silent judgment.
meanings.sent5: The image of the valkyrs hovering above the fighters was haunting.

meanings.sent1: The valkyrs gathered in the sky, ready to fulfill their duty.
meanings.sent2: I saw a flock of valkyrs descending upon the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The valkyrs looked like a team of powerful angels.
meanings.sent4: The valkyrs moved as one, a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the valkyrs flying together was awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: pertaining to or characteristic of valkyrs
meanings.sent1: Her valkyrs-like determination led her to victory.
meanings.sent2: The armor had a valkyrs touch, shining brightly in the sun.
meanings.sent3: He had a valkyrs spirit, always ready for a challenge.
meanings.sent4: The valkyrs essence in her eyes showed her strength.
meanings.sent5: The valkyrs aura around him was undeniable, a true warrior.
